entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 12:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:54 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:54 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with flurries beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:54 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:54 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
